statements: SELECT * FROM TherapySessionNotes
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE session_id = 1
SELECT therapist_name, session_date FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT progress_report FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT session_date, therapist_name FROM TherapySessionNotes ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT therapist_name, session_date, progress_report FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT progress_report, therapist_name, session_date FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT session_id, therapist_name FROM TherapySessionNotes ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, session_date FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE therapist_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, progress_report FROM TherapySessionNotes WHERE therapist_name = 'Alice' OR therapist_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM session_notes;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, note FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, note FROM session_notes ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, patient_id, note FROM session_notes WHERE session_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) FROM session_notes GROUP BY therapist_id;
SELECT therapist_id, MAX(session_id) FROM session_notes GROUP BY therapist_id;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, note FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT therapist_id, session_id, note FROM session_notes ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-05-01';
SELECT therapist_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_gender FROM clients WHERE client_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients WHERE client_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT session_id, report_date FROM progress_reports JOIN therapy_sessions ON progress_reports.session_id = therapy_sessions.session_id;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM clients WHERE client_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND client_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Therapists;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM Therapists WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT session_date, session_type FROM Sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email, therapist_phone FROM Therapists WHERE therapist_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT session_date, session_type FROM Sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date, notes FROM RecordingSessionNotes ORDER BY session_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date, notes FROM RecordingSessionNotes WHERE therapist_id = 1 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_email FROM Therapists WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT report_id, progress FROM ProgressReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, client_id FROM Sessions WHERE session_type = 'Individual Therapy' ORDER BY session_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_id, name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, dob, phone_number FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, patient_id, session_date FROM sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, progress FROM progress_reports WHERE therapist_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM session_notes WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, notes FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, date_created FROM progress_reports ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, patient_id, session_date FROM sessions WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND duration_minutes > 60;
